name: Hen Misadventures
description:
Hen Misadventures

Extra terrestrial life forms visits one of the earth's countryside and steals chicken younglings with their gravity beam! Brave hen tries to prevent their misfortune of ending up as tasty breakfast with fried eggs and space beacon. Your mission is to help the hen in rescuing all the younglings from the fate of ending in aliens' tummies.

Controls:
Arrow keys - Move left/right
Space bar - Jump/Skip cutscene and hints

Source code available on GitHub:
https://github.com/lethiandev/hen-misadventures
